#!/usr/bin/env python
import sys

primes = [2]

def isPrime(N):
    sqrtN = N ** 0.5
    for d in primes:
        if d > sqrtN:
            return True
        if N % d == 0:
            return False
    return True

def fillPrimes(maxVal):
    for i in xrange(primes[-1] + 1, maxVal, 2):
        prime = True
        if isPrime(i):
            primes.append(i)

def findPrPalin(N):
    if N % 2 == 0:
        N += 1

    while True:
        if isPrime(N):
            primes.append(N)
            strN = str(N)
            if strN == strN[::-1]:
                return N
        N += 2

if __name__ == '__main__':
    N = int(sys.stdin.readline().strip())
    if N in [1, 2]:
        print N
    else:
        fillPrimes(N)
        print findPrPalin(N)
